definition: to make a suggestion/to state (one's views, ideas etc)/suggestion/advice/idea
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct

sentences.english: Also advising the new president will be an entirely new National Security Council.
sentences.chinese: 向总统提供建言的还有整个新组建的国家安全委员会。

sentences.english: Various media to the new Chairman, Mr Guo "suggestions".
sentences.chinese: 各路媒体纷纷向新任主席郭树清“建言献策”。

sentences.english: What Cabinet-level agency advises the President on foreign policy?
sentences.chinese: 提供总统外交政策建言的内阁层级机关是？

sentences.english: Then I read Allan Leighton's advice to businesses for the new year.
sentences.chinese: 接着，我阅读了雷顿对各家企业的新年建言。

sentences.english: Provide advice to Department manager to manage their teams.
sentences.chinese: 就团队管理事宜为各部门经理建言献策。

definition: to put forward a suggestion (to sb in a senior position)/to offer a word of advice
to offer advice/to make a suggestion
to encourage the free airing of views (idiom)
to be involved in politics/participation in politics
to propose/to put forward (an idea)/to initiate
to say straight out/to point out bluntly/to give a straightforward account/to disclose
(of a court official) to present a memorial to the emperor (old)
to lay out (an argument) item by item/memorandum to a superior
